about_the_game:
Deep beneath the city - like an intricate maze - lies the old canal system, the area which - literally and figuratively - gathers all the filth around it. Most of the entrances and their surroundings were under the control of secret thief guilds, providing a great hiding place for its persecuted members and the possibility to store and transport contraband. The deeper parts of the sewers are in varying shape, some better, some entirely ruined. No one knows the tunnels' whole system, but those who have spent a lot of time in it, whisper that there are dark secrets hidden in its depths.

This DLC contains 6 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level

name: RPGScenery - Sewers Scene

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
